name: 劉玉蓀
objective:
1. 數位通訊簡介
2. 訊號功率及功率頻譜密度
3. 隨機程序及白色高斯雜訊
4. 最佳偵測規則 (optimal detection rule)
5. 基本無線通訊調變技術 (PSK, QAM, FSK, MSK)
6. 帶通訊號與系統
7. 正交多頻分工 (OFDM)
-
schedule:
1週             Introduction to digital communication systems
2-3週         Signal Power & power spectral density
4-6週         Random processes & additive white Gaussian noise (AWGN)
7週             Midterm exam
8-9週         Optimal detection rule
10-13週     Passband digital modulation techniques (PSK, QAM, FSK, MSK)
14-15週     Band-pass signals and systems
16-17週    Orthogonal frequency division multiplexing (OFDM)
